Name: Madness
About the game: Strory You a hero, so have to explore a world full of dangers. overcome various difficulties, traps and demons. Beware of because the danger is waiting at every turn. Can you prove to yourself that you are the hero and rid the world of evil. Features Over 20 levels filled with enemies, traps and secrets. The ambiance in each world. A lot of bosses, is different complexity of battlefield.
